Name: Institute of Business Studies & Research
Services Offered: Business Colleges , B.C.A. Colleges , B.B.A. Colleges , M.B.A. Colleges , M.C.A. Colleges ,
Details: IBSAR is a multi disciplinary business school focusing on actionable business programs. We ensure that our education is at all times relevant to business. We deliver well trained business leaders and managers who are able to influence across organizational boundaries. We are fully committed to high quality research. We continuously invest in research activities and recruitment of academic leaders in fields such as Strategy , OB , Finance , Marketing , Retail , Operations , General Management and IT . IBSAR offers you an outstanding learning environment by facilitating the best learning experience possible. Your learning experience will be influenced by the most recent developments in the field and delivered by experienced teachers, researchers, top management professionals and consultants. We draw on a deep pool of practitioners from a range of organizations. The school has entirely new insights and differentiation strategy to help management aspirants to grow into top ranking global professionals. The training at IBSAR starts from the word go as students have to manage the institute in all respects. Students are involved in admissions, administration, faculty selection, corporate interaction, project selections, internships, placements, various events and live projects. IBSAR TRUST approved and affiliated to Mumbai university and runs MMS/MCA/LLB/B.SC IT./B.SC Computer Science etc. IBSAR also is a leading provider of research and academic support to Tilak Maharastra University.

Details: IBSAR is a multi disciplinary business school focusing on actionable business programs. We ensure that our education is at all times relevant to business. We deliver well trained business leaders and managers who are able to influence across organizational boundaries. We are fully committed to high quality research. We continuously invest in research activities and recruitment of academic leaders in fields such as Strategy , OB , Finance , Marketing , Retail , Operations , General Management and IT . IBSAR offers you an outstanding learning environment by facilitating the best learning experience possible. Your learning experience will be influenced by the most recent developments in the field and delivered by experienced teachers, researchers, top management professionals and consultants. We draw on a deep pool of practitioners from a range of organizations. The school has entirely new insights and differentiation strategy to help management aspirants to grow into top ranking global professionals. The training at IBSAR starts from the word go as students have to manage the institute in all respects. Students are involved in admissions, administration, faculty selection, corporate interaction, project selections, internships, placements, various events and live projects. IBSAR TRUST approved and affiliated to Mumbai university and runs MMS/MCA/LLB/B.SC IT./B.SC Computer Science etc. IBSAR also is a leading provider of research and academic support to Tilak Maharastra University.

Details: GNVS Institute of Management has earned repute for excellence with its flagship course, the Master of Management Studies. MMS is a two year program conducted on campus. After completion of the course, the students are awarded the MMS degree from the University of Mumbai.GNVS recognized as one of the best MMS Institute in Mumbai and among the MMS College in Dadar area. At GNVS, our primary aim is to produce quality managers who go on to become assets to the organizations they work in. To achieve this, we emphasize on high quality educational content, delivered by some of the best faculty in Mumbai and familiarity with technology  evidenced by our state of the art Computer Lab. As a student of GNVS, one will learn about what it takes to succeed in the corporate world. We invite you to browse through our site to learn more about our courses.

Details: Founded in 2005, ICE College of Hotel Management and Catering Technology has made landmark progress and an impact in the hospitality scenario. The hospitality arm of ICE has expanded, adding campuses in Mumbai, Navi Mumbai, and Pune.We provide the perfect ambience for the pursuit of academic excellence. We offer B.Sc. in Catering & Hotel Administration, M.Sc. in Tourism & Hospitality Management, Diploma in Catering & Hotel Administration and much more. We emphasise the concept of an international curriculum as an evolving logic to respond to intense worldwide competition. The competition mainly due to customers' demand for the perfect service which leaves any hospitality manager little room for error.Our aim is to offer industry relevant curriculum to meet the ever growing demands of the service sector and to encourage reading and research to meet adequate quality assurance standards for a well-structured career path. We also aim to encourage students to reflect critically on theoretical and practical approaches to behaviour, work and organisation in the hospitality industry. We want students to develop the ability to cultivate, establish and fulfil customers needs. We want students to identify and solve profession related problems in a creative way and to perceive the significance of social, economic and environmental influences as they relate to the hospitality industry.Pursue a degree in our institution for the best education.

Details: Private institution, is an old & established technical institution (Estb.1965). Till today thousands of candidates have been trained in almost all engineering faculties such as Electrical, Electronics, Mechanical, Civil, Automobile, A/C & Refrigeration and Computers right from Technician level to Engineering level. Institute used to provide quality teaching for examinations such as AMIE, IME, IETE and even City & Guilds of London for many years ( till 1990-2000 ) along with ample practical facility. This approach of the institute proved to be very useful to the industry in getting technically qualified manpower. But then due to the introduction of many granted and non granted engineering colleges & polytechnics, the trend of students going for such examinations largely decreased.

Name: Don Bosco College - Hospitality Studies
Services Offered: Hotel Management Degree Colleges , Hotel Management Certificate Colleges ,
Details: In the five years the Institute has strategized and strived to provide the best infrastructure and recruit experienced and enthusiastic faculty to achieve its objectives.  Beyond the academic curriculum, there are various co-curricular activities and extra-curricular activities that provide students with the opportunity to discover and develop their talents. Whether it is organizing Theme Lunches or other events or playing on the football ground, the purpose is not only to discover and recognize individual talent but also to encourage students to work as a team.There is no dearth of qualified individuals from Institutes all over the country; however skills and knowledge are secondary in the Hospitality Industry where the key to success is Attitude. Details:
Started in the year 2007, NHTC (Panvel) is born through the nag of serving financially challenged strata of society and helping them to stand on their own. It was brain child of hotel management graduate and very well supported by Mr. Jagdish Naiks family - who were entrepreneur and running a hotel but wanted to do something for the rural people. These people were having least exposure to outside world and language as a barrier.With passage of time, like-minded people are joining us with the mission to "Educate and Inspire the Rural People of India" and now a full-fledged college is in the service of the society.Today we can boast:
 Fully furnished infrastructure with operational front office, housekeeping, food production and food & beverage service laboratories.
 Experienced faculties and counselors.
 On the job professional faculties.
 Affordable fees structure.
 Separate placement cell.
 Professionally made syllabus and program structure.
 Close proximity to railway station.
 Adjacent to highway and centrally located.

Details:
Dr. (Mrs.) Rashmi Samtani who mastered Ph.D. in Botany from Nagpur University in 1991 was always inclined towards Travel & Tourism. The zeal and her passion for Travel & Tourism compelled her to start as a faculty in travel & tourism, to understand the working, the practice, as well as the ambiguities of the subject. Further to crown her with significant subject knowledge she achieved IATA  UFTAA Standard, Advance and Consultant Certificates. Fame and recognition raised her up to become Principal of her franchise branch of IATA  UFTAA. In the year 2002, Dr. (Mrs.) Rashmi Samtanis confidence and her knowledge enhanced her to independently initiate her own Rashmis Trans World Academy at Sion which is also an IATA  UFTAA authorized training center. Exceptional training methodology, supreme faculties, extreme efforts and superior quality of the institution has resulted in students' outstanding performance and their demand in the field of Travel & Tourism. Further learning the demand of Aviation Industry, IIFLY institute was initiated to impart eminence training to the students aspiring to work as Cabin Crew or Ground Hostess.
Our Head Office Address: #1/3, Sion New Co-operative Housing Society, Above Allahabad Bank, Sion West, Mumbai -400022.

Details:
Council of Education and Development Program (CEDP) was formed in the year 2010, with a sole objective of providing improved quality of life to individuals and groups through apt training and education. Since then, the organization has strived to provide the most relevant training solutions to not only the metro and the mini-metro cities of the country, but to the most remote geographies so that the student communities at large can benefit from the knowledge gained from the education provided and enhance their employability and therefore, employment opportunities. At the same time, it has been a constant focus of the organization towards training and re-training requirements of the companies operating in the nation, to continuously improve productivity levels of the workforce. In this manner, the companies have formidably benefited in terms of the process and costs to hire, train and retain their respective manpower within their system. Over the last two years, CEDP has successfully been able to compartmentalize the entire operations into three broad verticals &ndash; Training and Education Delivery (Global Training Institute and North East Knowledge Lines), University Affiliations (BSS, MGU, NIMS, SVU and KSOU) and Employment Services (Career Graph). Currently there are 147 training and education centers across the country.We are  providing Direct 10th, 12th, Diploma Engineering, any Graduation (BA, BCOM, BSc, BScIT,B.Tech), any Masters (MA, MCom, MScIT, M.Tech) from UGC-AIU-HRD-AICTE-DEC Recognized University.

Details: We, National Institute of Information Technology and Professional Studies (NIITAPS), are a registered autonomous body with the sole purpose of promoting technical and professional education in our country. NIITAPS has been playing a very important role in the field of technical / vocational & professional education for more than5 years by promoting technical education amongst the masses without any commercial ambitions. NIITAPS is a technology-driven, professionally managed & well diversified complete IT Institution with ISO: 9001:2000 certification. NIITAPS works as a training partner for GKS (Gujarat Knowledge Society) a Gujarat Government initiative and also as a Programme Support Agency (MF) for RKCL (Rajasthan Knowledge Corporation Limited) a Rajasthan Government formed company. Recently we have obliged examination and certification, the authority being Government Polytechnic Nashik, an autonomous Institute of Government of Maharashtra for Maharashtra State. We also had successfully performed skill up-gradation programmes under NYKS, Ministry of Youth Affairs and Sports Department, Government of India for Thane Maharashtra. NIITAPS has around 900+ centres all over India and is engaged in computer and all kind of vocational education (i.e., beauty parlour, fashion designing, hotel & catering management, digital photography, travel & tourism, etc). Also, we provide training for software and web development, and Business Process Outsourcing (BPO). The steady growth of industrial and technical developments in the last period has increased the need for technically qualified personnel but the facilities for training remains limited. A few technical training institutes were set up for training students without uniform standard syllabi in various trades but NIITAPS took the lead in framing common syllabi for examinations in the various faculties and started conducting examinations on an all India basis. NIITAPS, however, is the pioneer organisation in conducting standard examinations and publishing books for students in technical subjects.

Name: Institute of Business Studies & Research
Services Offered: Business Colleges , B.C.A. Colleges , B.B.A. Colleges , M.B.A. Colleges , M.C.A. Colleges ,
Details: IBSAR is a multi disciplinary business school focusing on actionable business programs. We ensure that our education is at all times relevant to business. We deliver well trained business leaders and managers who are able to influence across organizational boundaries. We are fully committed to high quality research. We continuously invest in research activities and recruitment of academic leaders in fields such as Strategy , OB , Finance , Marketing , Retail , Operations , General Management and IT . IBSAR offers you an outstanding learning environment by facilitating the best learning experience possible. Your learning experience will be influenced by the most recent developments in the field and delivered by experienced teachers, researchers, top management professionals and consultants. We draw on a deep pool of practitioners from a range of organizations. The school has entirely new insights and differentiation strategy to help management aspirants to grow into top ranking global professionals. The training at IBSAR starts from the word go as students have to manage the institute in all respects. Students are involved in admissions, administration, faculty selection, corporate interaction, project selections, internships, placements, various events and live projects. IBSAR TRUST approved and affiliated to Mumbai university and runs MMS/MCA/LLB/B.SC IT./B.SC Computer Science etc. IBSAR also is a leading provider of research and academic support to Tilak Maharastra University.

Details: WLCI College India Ltd.  is one of the largest professional training institutions in India. Over the last 17 years, we have gained a reputation for providing high quality professionals to different industries, not only in India but all over the world. We operate 13 learning locations across the subcontinent. Each learning location provides world-class training facilities and has well qualified and experienced trainers conducting contact or e-learning sessions. All our learning locations are linked to the knowledge center at Noida through well-defined and rigorously implemented process. This ensures that you have access to the same high quality training and placement services, irrespective of the location you are based at. Our programs articulate into several international programs thereby providing you the opportunity to acquire international qualifications along with your WLCI College India Ltd. certification. These unassailable advantages have made thousands of young people choose WLCI College India Ltd. as a stepping stone to their careers. Contact us for further details.

Details:
Council of Education and Development Program (CEDP) was formed in the year 2010, with a sole objective of providing improved quality of life to individuals and groups through apt training and education. Since then, the organization has strived to provide the most relevant training solutions to not only the metro and the mini-metro cities of the country, but to the most remote geographies so that the student communities at large can benefit from the knowledge gained from the education provided and enhance their employability and therefore, employment opportunities. At the same time, it has been a constant focus of the organization towards training and re-training requirements of the companies operating in the nation, to continuously improve productivity levels of the workforce. In this manner, the companies have formidably benefited in terms of the process and costs to hire, train and retain their respective manpower within their system. Over the last two years, CEDP has successfully been able to compartmentalize the entire operations into three broad verticals &ndash; Training and Education Delivery (Global Training Institute and North East Knowledge Lines), University Affiliations (BSS, MGU, NIMS, SVU and KSOU) and Employment Services (Career Graph). Currently there are 147 training and education centers across the country.We are  providing Direct 10th, 12th, Diploma Engineering, any Graduation (BA, BCOM, BSc, BScIT,B.Tech), any Masters (MA, MCom, MScIT, M.Tech) from UGC-AIU-HRD-AICTE-DEC Recognized University.

Details: We, National Institute of Information Technology and Professional Studies (NIITAPS), are a registered autonomous body with the sole purpose of promoting technical and professional education in our country. NIITAPS has been playing a very important role in the field of technical / vocational & professional education for more than5 years by promoting technical education amongst the masses without any commercial ambitions. NIITAPS is a technology-driven, professionally managed & well diversified complete IT Institution with ISO: 9001:2000 certification. NIITAPS works as a training partner for GKS (Gujarat Knowledge Society) a Gujarat Government initiative and also as a Programme Support Agency (MF) for RKCL (Rajasthan Knowledge Corporation Limited) a Rajasthan Government formed company. Recently we have obliged examination and certification, the authority being Government Polytechnic Nashik, an autonomous Institute of Government of Maharashtra for Maharashtra State. We also had successfully performed skill up-gradation programmes under NYKS, Ministry of Youth Affairs and Sports Department, Government of India for Thane Maharashtra. NIITAPS has around 900+ centres all over India and is engaged in computer and all kind of vocational education (i.e., beauty parlour, fashion designing, hotel & catering management, digital photography, travel & tourism, etc). Also, we provide training for software and web development, and Business Process Outsourcing (BPO). The steady growth of industrial and technical developments in the last period has increased the need for technically qualified personnel but the facilities for training remains limited. A few technical training institutes were set up for training students without uniform standard syllabi in various trades but NIITAPS took the lead in framing common syllabi for examinations in the various faculties and started conducting examinations on an all India basis. NIITAPS, however, is the pioneer organisation in conducting standard examinations and publishing books for students in technical subjects.

Details:
The chairperson Shri J.K Jadhav has set up J. K KNOWLEDGE CENTRE at Wadala (East), Mumbai which has vast, green and peaceful environment of 80,000 sq.ft. and a huge multistoried building with 82 class rooms.
Shri J.K Jadhav established the trust BHARATIYA GRAMIN PUNARRACHANA SANSTHA (B.G.P.S.) in 1984. The Trust at present runs various institutions at Aurangabad. The Trust is running Engineering College, Two Management Institutes, Degree College of Arts, Commerce & Science, Jr. Colleges, 20 Schools, ITIs. Vocational Training Institute etc. for last 26 years. Some important projects are Hi-tech Institute of Technology, Rajarshi Shahu Institute of Management, Mumbai Institute of Management & Research (MIMR) Raja Shivaji Vidhyalaya, Saint Bahinabai Jr. College, Jivan Vikas Degree College of arts, Commerce & Science, Maharashtra ITI for Boys & Girls etc.
More than 8,000 students are pursuing various educational courses in different Schools and Colleges under the guidance of 500 teachers and other staff members

Details: IBSAR is a multi disciplinary business school focusing on actionable business programs. We ensure that our education is at all times relevant to business. We deliver well trained business leaders and managers who are able to influence across organizational boundaries. We are fully committed to high quality research. We continuously invest in research activities and recruitment of academic leaders in fields such as Strategy , OB , Finance , Marketing , Retail , Operations , General Management and IT . IBSAR offers you an outstanding learning environment by facilitating the best learning experience possible. Your learning experience will be influenced by the most recent developments in the field and delivered by experienced teachers, researchers, top management professionals and consultants. We draw on a deep pool of practitioners from a range of organizations. The school has entirely new insights and differentiation strategy to help management aspirants to grow into top ranking global professionals. The training at IBSAR starts from the word go as students have to manage the institute in all respects. Students are involved in admissions, administration, faculty selection, corporate interaction, project selections, internships, placements, various events and live projects. IBSAR TRUST approved and affiliated to Mumbai university and runs MMS/MCA/LLB/B.SC IT./B.SC Computer Science etc. IBSAR also is a leading provider of research and academic support to Tilak Maharastra University.

Details: GNVS Institute of Management has earned repute for excellence with its flagship course, the Master of Management Studies. MMS is a two year program conducted on campus. After completion of the course, the students are awarded the MMS degree from the University of Mumbai.GNVS recognized as one of the best MMS Institute in Mumbai and among the MMS College in Dadar area. At GNVS, our primary aim is to produce quality managers who go on to become assets to the organizations they work in. To achieve this, we emphasize on high quality educational content, delivered by some of the best faculty in Mumbai and familiarity with technology  evidenced by our state of the art Computer Lab. As a student of GNVS, one will learn about what it takes to succeed in the corporate world. We invite you to browse through our site to learn more about our courses.

Indian Management Institute with its vast reservoir of study material, digital content and knowledge base, is certainly a hallmark in the field of Indian education. Acton is a center for excellence operating from Thane, Maharashtra and offering quality Distance Education for working professionals, college students and aspirants who wish to attain a professional degree in Management simultaneously with a job or business. Details: WLCI College India Ltd.  is one of the largest professional training institutions in India. Over the last 17 years, we have gained a reputation for providing high quality professionals to different industries, not only in India but all over the world. We operate 13 learning locations across the subcontinent. Each learning location provides world-class training facilities and has well qualified and experienced trainers conducting contact or e-learning sessions. All our learning locations are linked to the knowledge center at Noida through well-defined and rigorously implemented process. This ensures that you have access to the same high quality training and placement services, irrespective of the location you are based at. Our programs articulate into several international programs thereby providing you the opportunity to acquire international qualifications along with your WLCI College India Ltd. certification. These unassailable advantages have made thousands of young people choose WLCI College India Ltd. as a stepping stone to their careers. Contact us for further details.

Details: Founded in 2005, ICE College of Hotel Management and Catering Technology has made landmark progress and an impact in the hospitality scenario. The hospitality arm of ICE has expanded, adding campuses in Mumbai, Navi Mumbai, and Pune.We provide the perfect ambience for the pursuit of academic excellence. We offer B.Sc. in Catering & Hotel Administration, M.Sc. in Tourism & Hospitality Management, Diploma in Catering & Hotel Administration and much more. We emphasise the concept of an international curriculum as an evolving logic to respond to intense worldwide competition. The competition mainly due to customers' demand for the perfect service which leaves any hospitality manager little room for error.Our aim is to offer industry relevant curriculum to meet the ever growing demands of the service sector and to encourage reading and research to meet adequate quality assurance standards for a well-structured career path. We also aim to encourage students to reflect critically on theoretical and practical approaches to behaviour, work and organisation in the hospitality industry. We want students to develop the ability to cultivate, establish and fulfil customers needs. We want students to identify and solve profession related problems in a creative way and to perceive the significance of social, economic and environmental influences as they relate to the hospitality industry.Pursue a degree in our institution for the best education.

Details: We, National Institute of Information Technology and Professional Studies (NIITAPS), are a registered autonomous body with the sole purpose of promoting technical and professional education in our country. NIITAPS has been playing a very important role in the field of technical / vocational & professional education for more than5 years by promoting technical education amongst the masses without any commercial ambitions. NIITAPS is a technology-driven, professionally managed & well diversified complete IT Institution with ISO: 9001:2000 certification. NIITAPS works as a training partner for GKS (Gujarat Knowledge Society) a Gujarat Government initiative and also as a Programme Support Agency (MF) for RKCL (Rajasthan Knowledge Corporation Limited) a Rajasthan Government formed company. Recently we have obliged examination and certification, the authority being Government Polytechnic Nashik, an autonomous Institute of Government of Maharashtra for Maharashtra State. We also had successfully performed skill up-gradation programmes under NYKS, Ministry of Youth Affairs and Sports Department, Government of India for Thane Maharashtra. NIITAPS has around 900+ centres all over India and is engaged in computer and all kind of vocational education (i.e., beauty parlour, fashion designing, hotel & catering management, digital photography, travel & tourism, etc). Also, we provide training for software and web development, and Business Process Outsourcing (BPO). The steady growth of industrial and technical developments in the last period has increased the need for technically qualified personnel but the facilities for training remains limited. A few technical training institutes were set up for training students without uniform standard syllabi in various trades but NIITAPS took the lead in framing common syllabi for examinations in the various faculties and started conducting examinations on an all India basis. NIITAPS, however, is the pioneer organisation in conducting standard examinations and publishing books for students in technical subjects.

Details:
INSD Kandivali offers an extensive range of courses in Fashion,Interior, and Jewellery design. Our graduates go on to work in and shape creative industries worldwide.
We, a group of three people Ms.Rakhi Sheth who has worked in theFashion industry for 10 years, Mrs . Padmalatha , faculty for PMT and Gold medalist in Textiles and Mrs. Anisa Khan working as a SeniorCounselor & Students Co-ordinator , also a faculty teaching English &Management Skills from the last 15 years, have comeup to promoteFashion & Interior Design Courses and also as a promising team for the future designers to come.We have introduced INSD (International School of Design) at Kandivaliwhich is the biggest names in Fashion& Interiors. It has emerged as one of the premier institute in the country for design, management and technologydeveloping professionals for taking up leadership positions in the fashionand interior scenario. It is established by prominent educationist and industry leaders. So our team has taken up this opportunity to introduce it at Kandivali for Students in Mumbai to avail this opportunity.The most important need for fashion students is UGC approved DegreeCourses which very few institutes in Mumbai have. Our aim and focus ison providing UGC approved Degree and Diploma courses to the studentsfor their bright future.The FacultyFaculty of the institute articulates a sense of expertise & dynamism inspiring the students to realize their full potential. insd faculty builds critically engaged teaching practices while testing its relevance through a wide range of projects and contexts.Students enhance their talent by working with the faculty on various real life projects gaining invaluable knowledge, experience and awareness on design application and industry dynamics. in the recent past, faculty & student teams have undertaken varied group tours & research visits with the relative industry, the faculty is a constant source of inspiration to the student commune encouraging them to integrate function with specialized knowledge.
Contact Us

Details: The campus offers high class facilities for teaching and research and a wealth of amenities for a rich and fulfilling student life. Students can take part in many sports and recreational activities in the Student Centre, or de-stress in the brand-new Sports centre. All round the year meditation is practiced in presence of His Holiness Param Pujya Vishwatmak Om Gurudev. His divine dictum is now being spread all over the globe like a wild fire. The trust has nearly 151 branches managed by local bodies, in India & abroad. Devotees spread as far and wide as American, Australian, French, German, Indian, Italian, Malaysian, Polish, South African visit the Ashram to get Spiritual solace.To provide best infrastructure along with home-like feel Vishwatmak Om Gurudev, College of Engineering (VOGCE) takes pride to provide all their students a well equipped package including best Classrooms, Well-equipped Library, fully setup Computer labs, Electronics Labs, home-made food along with Hostel facility. Life here is chilled out, yet highly productive. Away from the hustle and bustle of city life, the ambience is calm, green and perfect for students.

Details: Private institution, is an old & established technical institution (Estb.1965). Till today thousands of candidates have been trained in almost all engineering faculties such as Electrical, Electronics, Mechanical, Civil, Automobile, A/C & Refrigeration and Computers right from Technician level to Engineering level. Institute used to provide quality teaching for examinations such as AMIE, IME, IETE and even City & Guilds of London for many years ( till 1990-2000 ) along with ample practical facility. This approach of the institute proved to be very useful to the industry in getting technically qualified manpower. But then due to the introduction of many granted and non granted engineering colleges & polytechnics, the trend of students going for such examinations largely decreased.

Services Offered: Distance Education , Design Colleges , M.B.A. Distance Education , Fashion Designing Colleges , 12th Open School Distance Education , Hotel Management Degree Colleges , Hotel Management Diploma Colleges , Hotel Management Certificate Colleges , B.A Distance Education , B.Com Distance Education , Executive BBA Distance Education , Executive MBA Distance Education , B.C.A. Distance Education , Open School for 10th class ,
Details: Founded in 2005, ICE College of Hotel Management and Catering Technology has made landmark progress and an impact in the hospitality scenario. The hospitality arm of ICE has expanded, adding campuses in Mumbai, Navi Mumbai, and Pune.We provide the perfect ambience for the pursuit of academic excellence. We offer B.Sc. in Catering & Hotel Administration, M.Sc. in Tourism & Hospitality Management, Diploma in Catering & Hotel Administration and much more. We emphasise the concept of an international curriculum as an evolving logic to respond to intense worldwide competition. The competition mainly due to customers' demand for the perfect service which leaves any hospitality manager little room for error.Our aim is to offer industry relevant curriculum to meet the ever growing demands of the service sector and to encourage reading and research to meet adequate quality assurance standards for a well-structured career path. We also aim to encourage students to reflect critically on theoretical and practical approaches to behaviour, work and organisation in the hospitality industry. We want students to develop the ability to cultivate, establish and fulfil customers needs. We want students to identify and solve profession related problems in a creative way and to perceive the significance of social, economic and environmental influences as they relate to the hospitality industry.Pursue a degree in our institution for the best education.

Details: St. Francis Institute of Hotel Management is a part of this rapidly expanding, highly reputed St Francis Group of Institutions which already have several educational Institutes in India.The St Francis Group of Institutions have Higher Education Centers which are located in urban and semi urban areas, providing higher level general, Management and technical education with a view to create a technical entrepreneur and skilled professionals. The Societys institutes / schools / colleges have a very high level of competence and reputation and have been winning State and National awards. All the units of the Society are registered under the relevant laws of the States as Trusts/Public Societies, etc. They have their centers in USA, Canada, Germany, Switzerland, Italy, South America and Sri Lanka with Mumbai as the Headquarter.

Details: In the five years the Institute has strategized and strived to provide the best infrastructure and recruit experienced and enthusiastic faculty to achieve its objectives.  Beyond the academic curriculum, there are various co-curricular activities and extra-curricular activities that provide students with the opportunity to discover and develop their talents. Whether it is organizing Theme Lunches or other events or playing on the football ground, the purpose is not only to discover and recognize individual talent but also to encourage students to work as a team.There is no dearth of qualified individuals from Institutes all over the country; however skills and knowledge are secondary in the Hospitality Industry where the key to success is Attitude. Sessions in Personality Development, Counseling and a Weekly Assembly are some of the initiatives that help to instill Values in the students.

Details:
Started in the year 2007, NHTC (Panvel) is born through the nag of serving financially challenged strata of society and helping them to stand on their own. It was brain child of hotel management graduate and very well supported by Mr. Jagdish Naiks family - who were entrepreneur and running a hotel but wanted to do something for the rural people. These people were having least exposure to outside world and language as a barrier.With passage of time, like-minded people are joining us with the mission to "Educate and Inspire the Rural People of India" and now a full-fledged college is in the service of the society.Today we can boast:
 Fully furnished infrastructure with operational front office, housekeeping, food production and food & beverage service laboratories.
 Experienced faculties and counselors.
 On the job professional faculties.
 Affordable fees structure.
 Separate placement cell.
 Professionally made syllabus and program structure.
 Close proximity to railway station.
 Adjacent to highway and centrally located.

Details:
Dr. (Mrs.) Rashmi Samtani who mastered Ph.D. in Botany from Nagpur University in 1991 was always inclined towards Travel & Tourism. The zeal and her passion for Travel & Tourism compelled her to start as a faculty in travel & tourism, to understand the working, the practice, as well as the ambiguities of the subject. Further to crown her with significant subject knowledge she achieved IATA  UFTAA Standard, Advance and Consultant Certificates. Fame and recognition raised her up to become Principal of her franchise branch of IATA  UFTAA. In the year 2002, Dr. (Mrs.) Rashmi Samtanis confidence and her knowledge enhanced her to independently initiate her own Rashmis Trans World Academy at Sion which is also an IATA  UFTAA authorized training center. Exceptional training methodology, supreme faculties, extreme efforts and superior quality of the institution has resulted in students' outstanding performance and their demand in the field of Travel & Tourism. Further learning the demand of Aviation Industry, IIFLY institute was initiated to impart eminence training to the students aspiring to work as Cabin Crew or Ground Hostess.
Our Head Office Address: #1/3, Sion New Co-operative Housing Society, Above Allahabad Bank, Sion West, Mumbai -400022.

Details:
Council of Education and Development Program (CEDP) was formed in the year 2010, with a sole objective of providing improved quality of life to individuals and groups through apt training and education. Since then, the organization has strived to provide the most relevant training solutions to not only the metro and the mini-metro cities of the country, but to the most remote geographies so that the student communities at large can benefit from the knowledge gained from the education provided and enhance their employability and therefore, employment opportunities. At the same time, it has been a constant focus of the organization towards training and re-training requirements of the companies operating in the nation, to continuously improve productivity levels of the workforce. In this manner, the companies have formidably benefited in terms of the process and costs to hire, train and retain their respective manpower within their system. Over the last two years, CEDP has successfully been able to compartmentalize the entire operations into three broad verticals &ndash; Training and Education Delivery (Global Training Institute and North East Knowledge Lines), University Affiliations (BSS, MGU, NIMS, SVU and KSOU) and Employment Services (Career Graph). Currently there are 147 training and education centers across the country.We are  providing Direct 10th, 12th, Diploma Engineering, any Graduation (BA, BCOM, BSc, BScIT,B.Tech), any Masters (MA, MCom, MScIT, M.Tech) from UGC-AIU-HRD-AICTE-DEC Recognized University.

Details: We, National Institute of Information Technology and Professional Studies (NIITAPS), are a registered autonomous body with the sole purpose of promoting technical and professional education in our country. NIITAPS has been playing a very important role in the field of technical / vocational & professional education for more than5 years by promoting technical education amongst the masses without any commercial ambitions. NIITAPS is a technology-driven, professionally managed & well diversified complete IT Institution with ISO: 9001:2000 certification. NIITAPS works as a training partner for GKS (Gujarat Knowledge Society) a Gujarat Government initiative and also as a Programme Support Agency (MF) for RKCL (Rajasthan Knowledge Corporation Limited) a Rajasthan Government formed company. Recently we have obliged examination and certification, the authority being Government Polytechnic Nashik, an autonomous Institute of Government of Maharashtra for Maharashtra State. We also had successfully performed skill up-gradation programmes under NYKS, Ministry of Youth Affairs and Sports Department, Government of India for Thane Maharashtra. NIITAPS has around 900+ centres all over India and is engaged in computer and all kind of vocational education (i.e., beauty parlour, fashion designing, hotel & catering management, digital photography, travel & tourism, etc). Also, we provide training for software and web development, and Business Process Outsourcing (BPO). The steady growth of industrial and technical developments in the last period has increased the need for technically qualified personnel but the facilities for training remains limited. A few technical training institutes were set up for training students without uniform standard syllabi in various trades but NIITAPS took the lead in framing common syllabi for examinations in the various faculties and started conducting examinations on an all India basis. NIITAPS, however, is the pioneer organisation in conducting standard examinations and publishing books for students in technical subjects.

Details:
The chairperson Shri J.K Jadhav has set up J. K KNOWLEDGE CENTRE at Wadala (East), Mumbai which has vast, green and peaceful environment of 80,000 sq.ft. and a huge multistoried building with 82 class rooms.
Shri J.K Jadhav established the trust BHARATIYA GRAMIN PUNARRACHANA SANSTHA (B.G.P.S.) in 1984. The Trust at present runs various institutions at Aurangabad. The Trust is running Engineering College, Two Management Institutes, Degree College of Arts, Commerce & Science, Jr. Colleges, 20 Schools, ITIs. Vocational Training Institute etc. for last 26 years. Some important projects are Hi-tech Institute of Technology, Rajarshi Shahu Institute of Management, Mumbai Institute of Management & Research (MIMR) Raja Shivaji Vidhyalaya, Saint Bahinabai Jr. College, Jivan Vikas Degree College of arts, Commerce & Science, Maharashtra ITI for Boys & Girls etc.
More than 8,000 students are pursuing various educational courses in different Schools and Colleges under the guidance of 500 teachers and other staff members

Details:
Council of Education and Development Program (CEDP) was formed in the year 2010, with a sole objective of providing improved quality of life to individuals and groups through apt training and education. Since then, the organization has strived to provide the most relevant training solutions to not only the metro and the mini-metro cities of the country, but to the most remote geographies so that the student communities at large can benefit from the knowledge gained from the education provided and enhance their employability and therefore, employment opportunities. At the same time, it has been a constant focus of the organization towards training and re-training requirements of the companies operating in the nation, to continuously improve productivity levels of the workforce. In this manner, the companies have formidably benefited in terms of the process and costs to hire, train and retain their respective manpower within their system. Over the last two years, CEDP has successfully been able to compartmentalize the entire operations into three broad verticals &ndash; Training and Education Delivery (Global Training Institute and North East Knowledge Lines), University Affiliations (BSS, MGU, NIMS, SVU and KSOU) and Employment Services (Career Graph). Currently there are 147 training and education centers across the country.We are  providing Direct 10th, 12th, Diploma Engineering, any Graduation (BA, BCOM, BSc, BScIT,B.Tech), any Masters (MA, MCom, MScIT, M.Tech) from UGC-AIU-HRD-AICTE-DEC Recognized University.
